sentences.en: Interestingly enough, a few weeks later, Benjamin remarried.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是，几周后本杰明再婚了。

sentences.en: We find, quite interestingly, men are more affected than women.
sentences.cn: 很有趣的是，我们发现男性比女性更容易受到影响。

sentences.en: Interestingly enough, there's no agreed upon definition of Jazz.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是，人们对爵士乐的定义并没有一致的看法。
